Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Even though PFDTBT_20Per showed the highest hole mobility among the PFDTBT - based copolymers , it is UV - visible absorption spectrum showed greater blue - shifting than PFDTBT , as shown in Figures 2 and 3 , and it showed the widest band gap energy among all of the polymers considered herein.

| PFDTBT |
| PFDTBT_20Per |
| PFDTBT - based copolymers |

I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "UV - visible absorption spectrum" (this is a type of spectrum, not a material name)
* "Figures 2 and 3" (these are references to figures in the text, not material names)
* "polymers considered herein" (this is a general term for a class of materials, not a specific material name)
